title: Mind Quad!
description: John Q. Mind was the best soldier in America until his arms and legs got blown into his mind. He teams up with Jimmy Boombox to do good deeds in quirky small towns all across America.
quote: Some friends are really enemies. I came up with the word ‘frenemy.’
altHero: dramatically lit closeup of John Q. Mind
alt1: John Q. Mind, a double amputee, in a hospital bed
alt2: John Q. Mind telepathically throws a doctor across the hospital room
alt3: Jimmy Boombox, a parapalegic schoolboy, looks apprehensive
alt4: John Q. Mind rides a motorcycle out of a tunnel, Jimmy Boombox in the sidecar
